DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial compare oral anti-diabetic drug ( OAD ) combine insulin vs. insulin alone subject type 2 diabetes adequately control current OAD therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Repaglinide Combined With Insulin Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: HbA1c 7.5 % 13.0 % ( inclusive ) Fasting Cpeptide equal 0.33 nmol/l BMI ( Body Mass Index ) 25 32 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Medical history treatment insulin within last 6 month Impaired renal function , define serum creatinine 1.7 mg/dl ( 150 Âµmol/l )
